name: ICANM 2018: 6th International Conference & Exhibition on Advanced & Nano Materials
content: The ICANM2018 organizing committee warmly invite you to attend the ICANM 2018 conference. ICANM is an international conference focused on advanced and nano materials and encourage abstract submissions within advanced & nano materials and across a variety of fields. ICANM 2018 will Include keynotes & plenary talks, invited lectures, contributed papers, poster presentations, workshops, exhibitions and tours. The 6th International conference (ICANM2018) will take place in Quebec City. ICANM 2018 is an opportunity to network with some of the world’s leading scientists, and to experience the vibrant culture and to explore the natural wonders of Quebec city.
